author: Megan Ellis
title: Skywise introduces 'unlimited flying'
text:
Skywise introduces 'unlimited flying' Mon, 14 Sep 2015 5:09 PM Share Your Email 
Low-cost carrier Skywise Airline has announced a new package which will give passengers unlimited flights between Johannesburg and Cape Town. 
Dubbed 'Unlimited Flying', the package costs R7 999 per month and is all-inclusive. 
Customers will receive a 31 day pass which will allow them to fly as much as they want during the month. 
The membership includes priority check-facilities, free baggage up to 25kg, a personal travel manager, Whatsapp booking facility and a free snack on the menu. 
The airline currently only operates one route, but is expected to expand in the future. 
You can sign up for unlimited flying on the Skywise site . Related Articles
